import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Log support ticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/support/{ticketId}/{siteId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Logs a support ticket entry for an existing ticket within a specific site context. This is used to escalate tickets to a support team or create a support record for cross-site coordination, typically when a ticket requires assistance from another site or external support resources.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find the ticket and extract `Items[].TicketId`.
2. **siteId** – Use obtain from application context (user's site affiliation) or [GET /api/v1.0/sites/\{SiteId\}/settings](/docs/api/sites/get-site-settings-by-id) to verify target site.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with search criteria → extract `TicketId`
2. Determine support site: use known `SiteId` from application context or configured support site
3. Log support ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/support/\{ticketId\}/\{siteId\}](/docs/api/tickets/log-support-ticket)
4. Track: The ticket's support status is updated for coordination purposes

**Use Cases**: Cross-site support coordination, escalation to central IT, logging support interactions for audit purposes.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) – Find tickets to escalate
- [GET /api/v1.0/sites/\{SiteId\}/settings](/docs/api/sites/get-site-settings-by-id) – Get site details

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the ticket.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"siteId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the site.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Support ticket logged successfully"}}}
